json.Text:
<size=72>HOW TO PLAY</size>





The goal is to clear all of
the cards as fast as possible.











Complete a full stack<color=#ffc600> (K to A)</c> to clear it.
<color=#ffc600>Clear cards to score the most points.</c>

<size=72>HOW TO PLAY</size>


















Uncover face-down cards to score
points and create an empty cell.
<color=#ffc600>Clearing a cell early can be 
the key to victory.</c>

<size=72>HOW TO PLAY</size>


















When you're out of moves, draw cards
from the "Reserve" at the bottom.
<color=#ffc600>Only cards in the proper order 
can be moved.</c>

<size=72>HOW TO PLAY</size>


















<color=#ffc600>Timing is KEY</c>
Every game has a <color=#ffc600>${##}</c>-minute time limit.
Bonus points are scored for finishing early.

You will get more time bonus points
if you clear more face-down cards.

<size=72>ABOUT SCORE</size>


Each uncovered card +50
When you clear a stack, you will gain 780
points in total. See the detailed scoring
for each car below:
<color=#ffc600>A</c> +120
<color=#ffc600>2 </c>+110
<color=#ffc600>3 </c>+100
<color=#ffc600>4 </c>+ 90 
et cetera ...






Finish quickly to earn extra time bonus
points.

Time bonus calculation:
You may submit if are out of moves.

<size=35><color=#fe4646>You have</c> ${##}<color=#fe4646> free pause(s). After that 
          each pause will cost you ${##} points!</c></size>

Please resume.</c>

        This pause will cost you ${##} points!</c></size>

with the current score?</c>
</size>

        and you will be ${##} points this time!</c></size>

with the current score?</c>
</size>
